=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Beard Oil - Tea Tree Scent - Huge Man-Sized 4 oz Bottle - 100% Natural - Softens Your Beard and Stops Itching - Scent Women Love - Best Beard Oil And Conditioner For Men Review Date: 2016/05/27 Store: BEARDSMEN SPIRIT Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Liquid Volume': '4 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'BEARDSMEN SPIRIT', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2 x 2 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437251228'} Review Text: Ladies: beard oil is your friend! If you have hard to manage, dry, brittle hair, this can works WONDERS. I have very fine, wavy, frizzy hair AND I live in Florida, so the odds are always against my hair. After realizing that the ingredients in beard oils are the same as the ingredients in many hair products (like tea tree oil, jojoba oil, grape seed oil, etc), and hearing from other women about the benefits of using it in your hair, I wanted to give this a try. The tea tree oil and peppermint oil are absolutely wonderful for dry, itchy scalps, and just a little bit of this stuff goes a long way. I put a dime-sized amount of the beard oil in my palms and distributed it evenly throughout my hair, from roots to tips, and massaged it into my scalp as well. This oil is thicker than most oil treatments that are advertised for hair, so again, a little dab goes far! I like that, though, because it really feels like it's coating and absorbing into my thirsty hair. As my hair dried, the waves were well-defined and NOT FRIZZY, hallelujah!

Another secret for guys and gals: this type of beard oil containing tea tree oil can also be used in more uh, private areas. Why not keep hair in your nether regions just as soft as conditioned as hair in the upper regions? The tea tree oil is very soothing on razor burn as well. Basically, this beard oil is very versatile in its uses, and I'm loving it. Thumbs up, would recommend!

I will not rate items highly if they don't deserve the rating, and I write these lengthy reviews to help out fellow shoppers, since I always read reviews on products before buying. If this review has been helpful to you, please feel free to let me know by giving me a helpful vote; this helps me know which products I'm really doing a good job helping folks with :) Review Title: Ladies: This can tame your hair! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
